name: Robert Ghastlyhallow
bio: Dear employees. I am Robert Ghastlyhallow. I may be a pedantic man, but I am certainly no boomer. All those 'skibidi toilet' children always call me that. It's so rude. I like to write comments on the Instagram application, however they always respond claiming I have “negative aura”, whatever that means, not like I care though. Kids these days… Well, whatever happens, make sure to always use full stops if you contact me… I hate people who do not do so.
